alerts.title: EU AI Act Officially Passed
alerts.summary: European Parliament officially passes AI Act with strict regulatory requirements for high-risk AI systems, including biometric recognition and critical infrastructure.

alerts.title: SEC Cybersecurity Disclosure Rules
alerts.summary: SEC requires public companies to disclose material cybersecurity incidents within 4 business days, enhancing investor protection.

alerts.title: Singapore PDPA Amendments Effective
alerts.summary: Personal Data Protection Act amendments take effect, strengthening data breach notification obligations and cross-border data transfer requirements.

alerts.title: EU Data Governance Act Implementation
alerts.summary: Data Governance Act officially implemented, establishing data intermediation services and data altruism framework to promote data sharing.
